wikipedia_page.main: Dante Leverock (born 11 April  1992) is a Bermudian professional footballer who plays for Robin Hood and the Bermuda national team.

response: * Week 9 Team of the Week: D Dante Leverock Honorable Mention: D Ken Tribbett

link_mentions.page: List of CONCACAF Gold Cup goalscorers
List of foreign USL Championship players

response: Bascome was called up for the 2019 CONCACAF Gold Cup in the United States, Bermuda's first major tournament. He started all three games – losses to Haiti and Costa Rica and a win over Nicaragua – as his team were eliminated in third place. He assisted the opening goal by Dante Leverock to give Bermuda a shock half-time lead in the second game, and also set up Lejuan Simmons's opening goal in the last match.
